turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Ice sculpture.
turn.1: What is the Gilmore International Ice Sculpture Competition?
turn.2: Sanctioned by the National Ice Carving Association, Professional carvers are invited to compete in this event staged in the shadow of the glacier-clad Mt.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Twelve teams of three carvers are given 15 blocks of ice, weighing 300 lb each, which they must transform into ice sculptures in three days.
turn.7: Was there anything else of importance?
turn.8: Weather permitting; the sculptures will remain on display through March.
turn.9: Were there any other competitions mentioned?
turn.10: The annual Deep Freeze Festival in Edmonton , Alberta hosts a chisel-and-chainsaw ice carving competition the second weekend of January.
turn.11: What other aspects of the competition are there?
turn.12: Sculptures are created by professionals and amateurs using three blocks of ice.
